Title: Relates to requirements for the appointment of a guardian for personal needs or property management
Summary: Provides for requirements for the appointment of a guardian for personal needs or property management; requires financial institutions to provide all necessary bank statements for a Medicaid application to a requesting department of social services within thirty days of having received such request.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to requirements for the appointment of a guardian for personal needs or property management; and to amend the banking law, in relation to bank statements for Medicaid applications
